channel.title: Comments on: Links for Mon 25 Feb 2008

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
@Joe -
No problem, happy to hear that it is now available for users.
item.content:encoded:
@Joe –

No problem, happy to hear that it is now available for users.

item.title: By: Joe Cheng [MSFT]
item.dc:creator: Joe Cheng [MSFT]
item.description: Yes, I was meaning to e-mail you last night when I posted that, but I was at home where I don't have your e-mail address. Sorry it took so long to get that live.
item.content:encoded: Yes, I was meaning to e-mail you last night when I posted that, but I was at home where I don’t have your e-mail address. Sorry it took so long to get that live.
